topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55942f7a636872232e000074#post_55942f7a636872232e000074
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55942e666368723619001ecb#post_55942e666368723619001ecb
Apparently the people that make these Cereals like Cinnamon Toast Crunch, Trix, Cocoa Puffs, and more are going to be changing the ingredients to make them more healthy.

Take out all the Artificial Flavors.

"Here's an article":http://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2015/06/22/general-mills-artificial-ingredients-cereal/29101165/ [/bq]
On the one hand I can kind of see where they're headed. I mean if anything the taste is gonna be the same. But the price may go up a bit, That is until the law of Supply and Demand kicks in, then the price will drop and people will buy more.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
